title: Wholemeal Lentil Wraps
ingredients: ['6 wholemeal flour tortillas', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 shallots, finely chopped', '225g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '4 tablespoons dry white wine', '1 (400g) tin brown lentils, drained', '115g feta cheese, crumbled', '4 tablespoons chopped kalamata olives', '90g chopped tomatoes']
